mapper.select: select id , title , category , gmt_create , gmt_update , summary, tags , auth , markdown from article where id = #{ id } and auth <= #{ auth}
mapper.insert: insert into article( id , title , category , gmt_create , gmt_update , summary , tags , auth , markdown ) values( #{ id }, #{ title }, #{ category }, #{ gmtCreate }, #{ gmtUpdate }, #{ summary }, #{ tags }, #{ auth }, #{ markdown })
mapper.delete: delete from article where id = #{ id }
